text: DON'T MISS She blew the roof off! Lady Gaga calls for unity in electrifying performance at Super Bowl 51 singing America The Beautiful atop the stadium Britney Spears' niece Maddie, 8, is left in a 'serious condition after being submerged under water for several minutes' as ATV flips over Ellie Goulding turns up the heat on Instagram as she shows off her toned body in a skimpy plunging swimsuit while posing with a bikini-clad pal What a difference a day makes! Kate looks elegant in her favourite red suit to visit a London school a day after donning her trainers for marathon training TOWIE's Danielle Armstrong parades her newly-svelte figure as she reveals she's lost a STONE in just 12 weeks She's working hard on her new look 'She paid for his hair!' Myleene flaunts her stunning figure as she strips off to promote her new sizzling lingerie range 'I was asked to be in EastEnders': Sir Bradley Wiggins reveals hopes to launch acting career... after expletive-filled debut on The Jump Multi talented Her dancey man: Mariah Carey, 46, is shown some moves by toyboy Bryan Tanaka, 33 as she has a swinging good time in tiny black mini-dress On the prowl! Frankie Essex proudly parades her slim figure in a quirky tiger shirt-dress as she enjoys wild night out in Essex 'If Shelagh loses the baby I am out': Call the Midwife viewers threaten to BOYCOTT BBC drama after a devastating miscarriage warning for fan favourite Charlotte Dawson is preened to perfection for date with rugby ace beau Matt Sarsfield... as she sparks engagement rumours with eye-popping diamond ring No 'arm done! Recovering Richard Madeley steps out without his plaster cast after shattering his elbow in painful fall Wayne Rooney hooker Jenny Thompson shows off her tiny figure in tie-dyed bikini as she enjoys a day aboard a yacht in Tenerife Bella Thorne cuddles up to Nat Wolff as she flaunts her taut stomach in tummy teasing crop top in LA Out on a cosy display with the actor Zsa Zsa Gabor's husband Frederic Prinz Von Anhalt 'will not move out of their sold West Hollywood home' Estate was sold in 2013 for $11 million Like mother, like daughter! Britain's Got Talent comes under fire from hoax artist who claims auditions are 'manipulated to create a narrative' Mollie King shows off her assets and toned abs in extreme plunging embellished orange swimsuit with daring cut-outs as she poses by the pool Scotty T claims Steph Davis is checking him out in hilarious snap amid claims he's father to her child... before joking about 'making a great stepdad' PICTURED: Zoe Ball beams as she cosies up to new cameraman beau Billy Yates following split from husband Fatboy Slim Newly-single Scarlett Moffatt puts on a brave face for new weight loss selfie... as she 'moves back in with Gogglebox family following Luke Crodden split' Chloe Goodman risks baring all in VERY low-cut sequinned bikini bottoms as she shows off her physique during sun-drenched Tenerife break 'You're the one': Marco Pierre White Jr. hints he's engaged to new girlfriend Francesca in gushing Instagram post Seemed unable to contain his feelings Feeling perky! Fifty Shades Darker cast 'warned about using overtly sexual language' Piste off? Bradley Wiggins leaves The Jump viewers outraged as he SWEARS on live TV before the watershed during expletive-filled opening episode 'So ready': Heavily pregnant Tori Spelling, 43, wears just a bra as she shows off her bare baby belly She is eagerly expecting her fifth child 'That's a desecration': Zac Efron grosses out Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson as he wears patriotic Speedos in Super Bowl trailer for Baywatch Victory smooch! Gisele Bundchen congratulates Tom Brady with a kiss... after filming herself celebrating comeback win at Super Bowl LI 'Lady Gaga trying to outdo Spongebob': Artist gets rave reviews for Super Bowl LI halftime performance... but was still subject of hilarious memes 'Boom goes the dynamite': Chrissy Teigen has hilarious reaction to her live TV NIP SLIP from the stands during Super Bowl 'Kanye for Super Bowl 52': Kim Kardashian retweets suggesting West performs halftime show next year The campaign for 2018 starts here! 'I wouldn't be comfortable rushing it': The Wanted's Tom Parker reveals he is delaying his wedding to star alongside Louisa Lytton in Grease 'I have to beat him!': Lydia Bright takes aim at ex-boyfriend James 'Arg' Argent as she vows to outdo him on The Jump Tumultuous relationship Josie Gibson becomes the first celebrity to leave The Jump as she REFUSES to launch herself off the ski ramp in dramatic end to first live show 'Can't win them all': Patriots patron Mark Wahlberg consoles Falcons fanatic Usher as they lead celeb reaction to Super Bowl shocker Waiting for The Weeknd? Gary Barlow 'plans Let It Shine finale with all the gang... but doesn't invite ex-member Jason Orange' Chloe Khan reveals a tantalizing glimpse of underboob as she shamelessly tries to boost Instagram following with VERY steamy snaps 'There's nothing wrong with doing lingerie shoots!' Captain Sparrow swigs on a beer after making muddy return in Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales Super Bowl spot Drugs, sex, and Scientology: Nicole Kidman to 'write a tell-all autobiography' as insider confirms she could receive up to '$11 million in sales' Smokin' hot! Paris Jackson bares her midriff and shows off her legs in ripped jeans while pumping gas Making a statement at the gas station Diana Ross sports masses of purple curls as she runs errands in LA ahead of new mini residency in Las Vegas Motown legend 'They've crossed over to mean': Sean Spicer hits back at SNL after the Press Secretary was impersonated by a gum-chewing Melissa McCarthy 'They're celebrating': Kylie Minogue's family is 'thrilled' that she's broken her engagement with 'bulls**t artist' Joshua Sasse who they thought was 'bad news' Is Ed going to pop the question? Sheeran 'set to propose to girlfriend Cherry Seaborn while touring in Australia' after revealing he is in love for the first time Yummy mummy! Pregnant Binky showcases the first sign of her tiny baby bump in a suede T-shirt and over-the-knee boots after weekend with JP Shore-ly not!
